duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the opening and maintenance of a new Palm Beach location, responsible for all assets and required maintenance.
Hiring and training staff, maintaining quality control and consistency.
Ensuring clean communication across all departments and maintaining a sense of urgency and positive workplace interactions.

education_certification.credential: High-end catering or corporate restaurant experience
2+ years of high-end, high-volume kitchen experience
Experience in leading and supervising junior chefs, cooks, and porters
Private chef experience is a plus
